## Load Packages
```{r load packages, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(tidyr)
library(forcats)
library(ggplot2)
library(leaflet)
library(DT)
library(scales)

```

## Read Data
```{r load data}
escapement <- read_csv("https://knb.ecoinformatics.org/knb/d1/mn/v2/object/urn%3Auuid%3Af119a05b-bbe7-4aea-93c6-85434dcb1c5e")
```

## Explore Data
```{r explore data}

colnames(escapement)

glimpse(escapement)

range(escapement$sampleDate)

head(escapement)

unique(escapement$Species)


```

## Getting our data ready to plot

```{r cleaning}

annual_esc <- escapement %>% 
  separate(sampleDate, c("Year", "Month", "Day"), sep = "-") %>% 
  mutate(Year = as.numeric(Year)) %>% 
  group_by(Species, SASAP.Region, Year) %>% 
  summarize(escape = sum(DailyCount)) %>% 
  filter(Species %in% c("Chinook", "Sockeye", "Chum", "Coho", "Pink"))
  
unique(annual_esc$Species)
head(annual_esc)


```

## Plotting with `ggplot`

## Essencial components
```{r essencial}
## Option 1
ggplot(data = annual_esc,
       aes(x = Species,
           y = escape))+
  geom_col()

## Option 2 
ggplot(data = annual_esc)+
  geom_col(aes(x = Species,
               y = escape)) 

## Option 3
ggplot()+
  geom_col(data = annual_esc,
           aes(x = Species,
               y = escape))
```

## Different geoms

**Boxplot**
```{r}

annual_esc %>% 
  filter(Year == 1974, 
         Species %in% c("Chum", "Pink")) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Species,
             y = escape))+
  geom_boxplot()

```

**Line and point**

```{r}
annual_esc %>% 
  filter(Species == "Sockeye",
         SASAP.Region == "Bristol Bay") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Year,
             y = escape))+
  geom_line()+
  geom_point()
```

### Custominzing our plot
fill = blue inside the aes function 
```{r}
ggplot(annual_esc,
       aes(x = Species,
           y = escape,
           fill = "blue"))+
  geom_col()
```

fill = "blue" outside of the `aes()`

```{r}
ggplot(annual_esc,
       aes(x = Species,
           y = escape,))+
  geom_col(fill = "blue")
```

Adding colors by region

```{r}
ggplot(annual_esc,
       aes(x = Species,
           y = escape, 
           fill = SASAP.Region))+
  geom_col()
```
